HomeWiki:
Project Description
BEControlCenter links technologies to deliver immerse control system for various external devices.

BEControlCenter is a project which link technologies to deliver immerse control system for various external devices (in example modified RC car, etc).

Some of planned features:
  • Easy to configure and use
  • Customizable list of commands
  • real-time (visual) feedback from both: controller and device
  • Extendable via MEF plugins

BEControlCenter is part of BEControl project. More information can be found on my beetrootSOUP blog.
